text:
[Verse]
In a town of sugar highs
Lollipops and sunny skies
Marshmallow clouds so sweet
Candy flowers line the street

[Verse 2]
Ice cream rivers that gleam
Chocolate hills with whipped cream
Gummy bears on parade
Every day's a sweet charade

[Chorus]
Candy coated dreams
In colors bright it seems
Life is like a treat
So simple yet so sweet

[Verse 3]
Rainbow sprinkles everywhere
Gingerbread houses fun to share
Fizzing soda pop streams
Bubblegum wishes and schemes

[Bridge]
When the world is hard outside
In this place we'll laugh and glide
Sugar coats our fears away
Making moments simply play

[Chorus]
Candy coated dreams
In colors bright it seems
Life is like a treat
So simple yet so sweet
title: Candy Coated Dreams
